name: Iguanothon
description:
Developed For Ludum Dare 46

Try to escape to the ocean :DD

How long did it take you?

Controls:
  • Movement: WSAD
  • Jump: Space
  • Sprint: Shift
Developed by:

InflamedGums, Cord, Owlkward

Development Tools:
  • Godot
  • Blender
  • Bfxr
  • GIMP
